title: Bermuda Triangle - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/28/19
itunes:title: Bermuda Triangle - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/28/19
description:
George Noory and author Mike Bara discuss his research into the Bermuda Triangle, the history of disappearing planes and ships in the area, and whether there is a connection to UFOs and aliens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
